```{r Setup}

packs = c('dplyr', 'forecast', 'fpp2', 'ggfortify', 'ggplot2', 'knitr')

		install.packages(pack, quiet = TRUE)

	library(pack, character.only = TRUE)
}
```

## Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r EDA}
#| echo: FALSE

autoplot(EuStockMarkets[, 'FTSE']) +
	labs(title = 'Daily Closing Prices of Major European Stock Indices, 1991-1998',
		  x = 'Time',
		  y = 'FTSE') +
	theme_minimal()
```
